website_summaries.verdict: A stronger version of a bungee assortment set that costs a little more, but comes with a practical case and metal hooks.
pros: Zipper bag does a good job of holding all pieces
Keeps items in a vehicle secure
Metal hooks covered in plastic to keep them from scratching
cons: Not every bungee in the set is of the same quality
The small bungees are very thin

customer_reviews.title: I like them so much that I bought a second set.
customer_reviews.text: These bungees are the best I've ever owned. I like them so much that I bought a second set. Housing the metal hook inside molded plastic was a stroke of genius. But that's the kind of world we live in now, where the traditional meets the technological and new products are born of that merger through the minds of brilliant young inventors. I don't expect high impact plastic like this to crack any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Foghorn Leghorn

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be a blessing
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure if I needed more bungee cords but who doesn’t always need more bungee cords!! Actually wavered on the block zipped case but ended up loving(!!) it. So organized and has rubber bands so I can keep it that way. Burning through all my previous corded so my future is only this organized selection. Scary it even mattered or moved me enough to write this but it really simplified a lot of spaces (house, cars, boat, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact carrying case.......
customer_reviews.text: Just recently received a bungee cord set and it’s exactly as described. Shipping was quick. Unable to comment at this time regarding durability and sturdiness as I just got them . They appear to be your standard cords so only time and use will answer the question as to durability. A fair value for the money at this point but the durability will play a huge part regarding value.......
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: High quality cables and well made hooks
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this kit. I was very happy with my first one, but it was either "borrowed" or I misplaced it. After looking around again, I decided to repurchase this same kit. It has a good mix of lengths, they are well made, and the hooks are not cheesy wire hooks that can scratch or pop off - they are well made, solid, plastic hooks that I feel safe using on any surface. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: 14 good quality bungees. The rest are junk.
customer_reviews.text: This set looked like it would be a great variety to put into the truck to secure spontaneous purchases. I am disappointed. 14 of the 24 are good quality, but the others are worthless. The cargo net is handy if you need to strap down a small bag of groceries, but who does that? The little bungees are super thin and have tiny metal hooks. I should have shopped around a little more. There are better sets out there for sure.
customer_reviews.author: goatmom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I needed some good quality bungee cords for my upcoming motorcycle trip to tie things down on my bike. I had plenty of bungee cords but they were cheap ones and I didn't want to risk using them. This product has exceeded my expectations. Well built and should work perfect of my uses. Good size assortment and glad I went with hooks that are plastic (won't scratch my bike) and has a steel core (so they won't break like plastic might).
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Nice package size to keep in RV for emergency need
customer_reviews.text: Nice package size to keep in RV for emergency need. I would have like this better if there had been metal hooks instead of plastic but overall seems like this will fit the need. Revised review: I have now learned that the hooks are indeed metal and have a plastic coating to protect the surfaces they are used on! Fantastic! Went from 4 to 5 stars! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Evierose

customer_reviews.title: Bungee cords worked very will good assortment. But I did not receive the small ...
customer_reviews.text: Bungee cords worked very will good assortment. But I did not receive the small net that was suppose to be included with package as shown in photo as advertised forgotten in package. Or? Update just a mix-up, manufacture emailed me ASAP as to what they could do to help. Very professional and right on top of the issue, they sent me out the missing item ASAP and I have rec'd --- we just used thekit to move out of state and it worked GREAT on our Honda Ridgeline, keep everything were we put it ! No problems also had plenty of stretch left over perfect do recommend purchasing product very good : Customer Service also GREAT
customer_reviews.author: jhb

customer_reviews.title: So guess I made a good purchase & my husband would recommend them for others
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Bungee cord hook assortment for my husband as he can never find his when he needs one. He said "great assortment & well worth the money spent for them (which was very inexpensive for what you get after checking with our local stores. So guess I made a good purchase & my husband would recommend them for others.
customer_reviews.author: Ralhicaj

customer_reviews.title: A nice mix of bungee cords
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mix of bungee cords that come with a very handy container so that you can keep them together when they are not in use. The cords seem to be of high quality and so far, we are very delighted. Time will tell how durable they are, but from examination, I expect that they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: cheetah-star

customer_reviews.title: The new version of the bungee cords!
customer_reviews.text: This 24 piece bungee cord set are the best ones that I have ever owned! The biggest difference is that these cords have a hook that is moulded to the cord so the cord can’t slide past the hook which keeps your items nice and tight. The cord are also color coded based on the size of the cords and the cords come with this convenient storage case to keep the bungees in one place. I’m very pleased with this purchase and would recommend these, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nor'easter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep in my truck just in case: Piece of mind in a bag.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of mind in a bag. I ordered this set of bungee cords for my truck -- to strap things down and secure them. I keep it under my seat but I've already used a couple to secure a gate that divides our pasture. Bungee cords and like duct tape: there's few things they can't do and everyone needs some at hand.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: I think these will last a few years
customer_reviews.text: As warmer weather approaches I will be using bungees to strap luggage to my Harley, usually I get my bungees from Walmart or harbor freight but this time I happen to run across these bungees that had a warranty, when you strap luggage to a bike every day for a couple of weeks your Walmart and harbor freight bungees aren't likely to survive through to the next year. I haven't used these new bungees yet but they are clearly made out of a different type of material than that other stuff and so I fully expect these to last for at least a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Omer D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good bungees, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These bungees are nice. The company offers a lifetime guarantee that they stand behind.The ten small cords and cargo net have metal hooks just so you are aware. The net hooks so have small rubber caps, you may want to glue them on if you are using on a vehicle. All in all it's a great value from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Buddhabear

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this. I used them to tie down my "POD" unit. Moved from NJ to SC, basically 5 states and all my packed and tied down POD stayed in place. No bungee was broken and they held everything in place. Going to be using this bungee set again, very handy to have around. There are not the cheap bungees that get loose or break at the hook portion, very solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: -Lu

customer_reviews.title: Useful Bungee Set at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My husband made fun of me for purchasing a brightly colored bungee cord set for our camping trip, but he used half the package to secure a tarp over our tent in a rain storm. They held up great and were easy to find when it was time to pack up....no bungee left behind! I love the plastic coating instead of the metal hooks. Highly recommend this set. Has a lot of useful lengths and items. I can see us using this set for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Clapp

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying
customer_reviews.text: These are a wonderful set of bungees. I bought them because a friend recommended them and they work well. Love the coated hooks and the variety of sizes. They are well made. Well worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: gil fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Review of Premium Quality Bungee Cord Assortment - 24 Piece Set w/ Canopy Ties & Bonus Cargo Net by FORTEM
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact assortment with carrying case and canopy net. I would have given it five stars had all the steel hooks been plastic coated as the web description and description with the shipped item implied. The mini cords have bare metal hooks with sharp edges.and only the hook tips of the canopy net are plastic (rubber?) coated.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Just average utility.
customer_reviews.text: Tensile strength was not as strong as I expected from a "premium quality" cord. Two of the cords were slightly frayed with a broken elastic band poking through. I'm not sure what the use would be for the smallest bands. They have very little tensile strength.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: These bungee cords are fine if used indoors but they don't hold up to the elements. We used one bungee cord (pictured) to keep our grill cover secured for about two months during the spring and it basically disintegrated
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and super value.
customer_reviews.text: A good variety of Various length bungees. Pleased with packaging and quality of this product. A very good purchase and I recommend Fortem to others.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Bolita

customer_reviews.title: Half the bungees have already snapped or frayed exposing the elastic. NOT strong.
customer_reviews.text: These looked to be good quality at first, but after being outside for the past couple months, half the bungees have already snapped or frayed exposing the elastic. These are not strong at all. The colored fabric becomes brittle and even shed. Not great for outdoor use. However, I the yellow ones in our car and those have held up fine, but they only get light usage holding down items in the back of our suv. So if you want bungees for indoor use, these would probably be fine. For for 100% outdoor use - these aren't great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Birth

customer_reviews.title: Bungee Cords Tore Completely Through
customer_reviews.text: We used these bungees to tie down a tarp on our truck bed. The plastic hooks were nice so it didn't scratch the paint. However, the first 30 minutes of our trip trying to get out of town, we had to stop literally 5 times because a cord would snap completely through. Luckily we had our old school rubber bungees with metal hooks to help with strength. The green one in the pic was one that actually made it home but you can see the fraying. I guess if you use them for a canopy with NO WIND or for why we used them but aren't going faster than 35 mph, they would be ok?
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product with good quality and bright colors. I received it in couple days. Everything was in place except three hooks were missing from the net. I found the card with customer service E-mail address inside of the box I received and informed about the problem with hooks. I received reply just in couple hours and replacement net with all hooks in two days. They also allow me to keep original net. So I glad that I got the product I need with great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Kapitan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last in direct sunlight
customer_reviews.text: So I’m writing this two months after first using it. It seems to work well as long as it’s not in the sun. It deteriorated very quickly in direct sunlight. I wish I would have known this since I’m planning on using them outside. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good selection/bad smell
customer_reviews.text: In general the package of cords ~ when opened had a horrible odor of oil... that being said.. I do believe they will work just fine for the tie downs of covers on the my deck furniture... the little 'cargo net' included does not seem to fit anythhing and am not sure what the company intended it for.. There is a nice selection of sizes of the cords.
customer_reviews.author: "sam"

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased bulk bungee packages numerous times and FORTEM's product stands out as offering more bang for the buck. The bungees seem to be of good quality and the kit has a nice selection of bungees and accessories to be useful in many scenarios. Overall this is a good product at a good price. I did not rate durability and sturdiness as I will have to see how they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: CyberZoey12

customer_reviews.title: Great extras
customer_reviews.text: I knew I wanted bungees for my SUV. I plan to camp in my Rav4 all summer. What gave this product the extra bump to 5-stars is the extras. Not only do I get great bungee cords with the various lengths I was needing, but they have these little bob-top loops I can hang my portable fan on. As well as the net. Yes. If you need bungees get this set. The zipper container helps to keep them all in one place when you are not using them.
customer_reviews.author: Kodzo

customer_reviews.title: Everything is durable/high quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m using a relative’s truck for the summer to haul items while reorganizing house and yard. These are extremely well made and durable. The case is easy to throw in the truck behind driver seat and also to store in the home. I like that the case has one side see-through vinyl for quick identification.
customer_reviews.author: Green Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Cords, Great Variety, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These bungee cords are GREAT! As the title says, great cords at a great price! I'm super pleased with the variety of lengths and strengths. The extra clips, ties, and ball bungees are an added bonus. I have half of the cords, various sizes, in use already and they're holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Santa

customer_reviews.title: Product Comment
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Exceeded my expectations. Perfect for so many projects I have. While I'm not a guy, I found so many uses that it was perfect for that I didn't have to call my son for help. Perfect for an independent (and very feminine) woman who is not afraid to tackle projects. Definitely recommend for any household project and for anyone with any skill level!!!
customer_reviews.author: VKLP

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me exactly what I asked for. A big, low cost bag of bungee cords. Quality seems okay, not great but above my expectations for the price. The bag is actually functional which astounds me based on past buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. Many different sizes of bungee cords, as well as a little net. I used them to hold things down on the outside of my care as I made a 600 mile drive. Hopefully they'll hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: caterg

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of bungee cords. I carry them in my car for camping, using them for securing my folding solar panel and rigging a tarp awning. The cords themselves are well made, though the case provided is pretty flimsy. Unlike some reviewers, I like the plastic covering on the ends: helps prevent scratching. Time will tell about their durability.
customer_reviews.author: RMcD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, real bargain
customer_reviews.text: I just received the bungee cords plus so haven't used them yet but it's like a first aid kit of bungees. I have to truck all my groceries from the car to the house which isn't far but I just can't lift so having varying sizes is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: These bungee cords are superbly made. Strong and durable under tough weather conditions. I also like the bag that came with the cords to keep everything neatly organized in one place. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: A John

customer_reviews.title: Bungee Cords with the clips and a net.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure whatever we have to tie down with this package you have all the bases covered. Clips to hold a tarp down, net fro floats to go to the river, all size cords for sure they will be used. Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my bike!
customer_reviews.text: Use the cords to hold my bike in place and it’s very effective and helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: quality-variety
customer_reviews.text: Being a woman, I don't have a great need for this many bungee hooks, but they're great for holding items in place and holding your trunk down when transporting large items. I will share these with my son-in-law and grandson. I know they will have use for them. Also - the quality seems very good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marie

customer_reviews.title: The hooks on ends are nice large plastic hooks
customer_reviews.text: These bungees are very high quality. The hooks on ends are nice large plastic hooks. There is not the usual concerns of wires that scratch your material when you attach the cords. The bungees are of high quality and will probably last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tad

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently handy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it arrived fast and just in time for some furniture move I had pending where I used my truck, Great gift if you are want to impress someone. I love the case that keeps all items together and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Guys? You’re welcome in advance!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t call it a bargain, more of a steal! High quality sturdy bungee cords and a net, neatly packaged in a case. All ready to go when you are. Customer service is second to none, so its a double win.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tejada

customer_reviews.title: Bungee Cords with storage.
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas gift. The recipient requested only the cords but when I saw this item with the variety of cords etc available and the storage already solved I knew it would be a winner..... and it was.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Z. Langan

customer_reviews.title: Husband's dream present
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved that these came with a carrying case. He uses straps like these for all sorts of things and always has some in his truck at all times, usually scattered throughout his tool box. The case will help him keep them handy. they appear to be good quality. I will update on that in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!! Came in handy when I moved!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and handy collection of bungees to have in your trunk. For me, they became useful pretty quickly as we used most of them when I was moving my storage unit. This has a ton of different bungees for a variety or uses. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cldsk

customer_reviews.title: Everything looks great, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks great, can't beat the price. Have yet to actually use them but they look of decent quality, especially for the money. Customer service, Amy, emailed me multiple times to let me know they have shipped, to ask if they arrived, and if I was happy with the product. I'm sure if I had any issues they would've been resolved quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unlimited variety of uses and well made
customer_reviews.text: Lots of thought went into this product and package. Bungees of varying length, a net and some clips to attach the net. I am using all of this outside to thwart a rampaging raccoon. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Sig

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bungees for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use mine to secure items to my bike's racks. The plastic hooks ensure no scratches. They're well made, and although I can't speak to the durability because I've only had them a short time, they seem like they'll last. The packaging also makes this a good buy and, to me, shows a commitment to quality. Having a zip up bag to keep unused cords together is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: STRENGTH..QUALITY.. AND A GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS AWESOME!! THERE ARE VARIOUS SIZES AND COLORS AND THE STRENGTH OF THESE CORDS ARE UNBELIEVABLE. I USE THE CORD FOR JUST ABOUT EVERYTHING FROM AROUND THE HOUSE TO OUTDOORS TO SECURE MY ITEMS. IT COMES WITH A LIFETIME GUARANTEE AND FOR THE PRICE AND QUALITY IT CAN BE BEAT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone but especially touring motorcyclists
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for anyone but especially for motorcyclists, especially those that tour or just need to secure bulky or irregular items. The case is sturdy and easily contains all the bungee cords and the cargo net, and more. I added two additional cargo nets and had no trouble zipping the case closed. The case will easily fit in a bike's saddle bags or Tour-Pak® luggage carrier..I highly recommend this premium quality bungee kit.
customer_reviews.author: BobR

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cords for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Used these to attach 2 large totes to a hitch rack. They worked great even when they got wet. Have not found a use for the netting....seems a tad on the small side; or I am using it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Spicher

customer_reviews.title: Cheep not inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheep set of bungee cords and a net that's to small to be of any use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Starke

customer_reviews.title: Small net
customer_reviews.text: The bungee net thing that comes in this set is TINY. So small that it's basically useless! The bungee cords themselves were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipment arrived timely and well packaged. What a great value as you get all kinds of different size bungee cords - a size for every use and a carrying case. I like the cargo net best of all as it fits beautifully in the back of my Jeep Wrangler. A very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit. I especially like the little net that comes in with the set. It stretches to approximately 40"x40". I throw the kit in the back of my Jeep so I have them available all the time. The zippered bag with a clear top is a nice touch and makes keeping the cords and net readily available for use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked mine so well I purchased another pack I months later for my son. The little net is pretty much useless but they have great tension and are holding up well. I also like the fact that they have a storage case.
customer_reviews.author: 3kidslater

customer_reviews.title: Very good for its price
customer_reviews.text: It's worth having this at home. I've used it for various purposes, ranging from securing the furniture to the dolly while moving them around, to keeping my tree branches intact during heavy winds. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ACV

customer_reviews.title: Great for motorcycle trips
customer_reviews.text: I secured all my bag on my motorcycle with ease. Nothing moved.
customer_reviews.author: ZUL OLMO

customer_reviews.title: Just note the case is small and most of the bungees are pretty small too
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted the bungee net. Got a whole lot more for a few more dollars. Went to Wallymart and found bungees that cost more, but could not find a bungee net. This Bungee cord assortment even came with a carrying case. Well worth it. Just note the case is small and most of the bungees are pretty small too. Perfect for motorcycles and cars.
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: Strong bungee cords
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty strong and a great value for the money. Lasts many years. I had run out of the similar ones I bought at Sams and these have the same great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Narahari Mahadevan

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Good size assortment. Durable. Needed tie downs for a tarp covering items in the back of my truck while traveling in snow and rain. These did great!
customer_reviews.author: Ida O

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment of bungee cords!
customer_reviews.text: Nice assortment of bungee cords in various sizes for a good price. Very strong. I like the different colors too. They fray a bit when used outdoors by the water though. But for the price, still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Dan - Pool And Spa

customer_reviews.title: Replaced promptly
customer_reviews.text: Very damaged. They are thin in places and have a lot of white elastic showing. Would not recommend or buy again. I received a new package today and it looks very good. What I expected. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of bungees!
customer_reviews.text: We've needed bungees on occasion, but didn't have any. Still working on the whole adult-ing thing, it's a process. This seemed like a good assortment for all sorts of events where one is needed. I like the mini ones, they're so cute! Ya, I'm weird. Anyhoo, all of them seem good quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed. This works great for either at home or packs very well for travel, which is the main reason for purchasing this. Love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Matherly

customer_reviews.title: Cords are strong and case is great 👍!
customer_reviews.text: Great variety and has good, strong ends that actually fit in the holes in my tarp. Love the cargo net and the smaller bungees. The fact that they come in a zip case instead of a plastic card is a super plus!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best Bungees No-Poke or Scratch Plastic Hooks
customer_reviews.text: All the bungees you could possible need. I haven't even come close to using them all. I love the plastic hooks because the won't scratch or poke anything. these are great quality. the carrying case is fantastic since it keeps them all in one place. I keep it in my car and have used them many times.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: They look like they are heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: They look like they are heavy duty. I carrier bungees in my truck for tying down things on my truck. some of my old ones are getting worn out. Have not used any of the new ones yet.
customer_reviews.author: Garold L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A household must!
customer_reviews.text: I have found many uses for bungee cords and these will be useful and long lasting, I am sure. It is particularly nice to have a selection of lengths on hand and the carrying case is very useful too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed to get so many bungee cords of different sizes even a cargo net for a great price. I go through a lot of bungee cords and I snapped up the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Philip S.

customer_reviews.title: The carry case, if you are disciplined, it will be th last bungee kit you’ll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal, comes with a zippered carry case, they are different colors to denote length and the hooks are scratch proof . Also comes with a cargo carrier net which is terrific. That item is worth $ 8-10 if you were to buy it alone. So the total price of this kit is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Solid bungee for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t jump off a cliff with these attached to my ankles but they certainly held down my camping stuff and keep my BBQ grill cover in place on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Package Kit is nice to have.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this a few days ago and I have not used the cords yet. It looks as good as it was advertised to be. I will test it out within a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Black

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the chance to actually use these yet, however having used bungee cords for years, these really impress. The set is quite complete and well thought out. The bungee cords seem very well made and the selection of lengths is great. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rickkster

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Set
customer_reviews.text: The bungees are nice and thick, very sturdy. I suspect they will be put to good use and be in service for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Irishspirit

customer_reviews.title: great kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit of bungees. A couple different sizes and a nice bag to carry store them in. They will fit nicely in my truck. Also love the email I got saying a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMI MATTHEWS

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have around
customer_reviews.text: Bungee cords.. they stretch. They hold stuff. They'll probably let you down one of these days, but hey, nothing lasts forever right?
customer_reviews.author: Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea !!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a family member for Christmas. I am sure he is going to love it ! Would not hesitate to order from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pack of bungees! Just used a bunch to hold down a huge stack of beach stuff on a hitch trailer. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: VanFam

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set. I bought this to keep in my camper we always seem to need bungee cords and this set gives you so many options.
customer_reviews.author: Martha C

customer_reviews.title: I would say the best part of this kit is the bag
customer_reviews.text: The assortment of bungie cords provided with this set came in handy for packing a variety of items. Yet, I would say the best part of this kit is the bag, which actually fit all of the cords back in (plus a few other non-kit items) without being wrapped up like they were just coming from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality bungees. Really happy they come in a soft case for easy storage. They were bigger than I expected, and I would have preferred a couple smaller ones, but overall happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with many different sizes, a cargo net, AND a handy dandy carrying case! There is a bungee in that bag that you need!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the bungee cords set! The varied sizes along with the tarp clips are exactly what I need for camping and kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Dana B

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Well made, we use it to keep some of our outdoor items together. No issues so far, seems to be pretty sturdy. I like that it comes with a number of different sizes for whatever needs you may have.
customer_reviews.author: C. L.

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time
customer_reviews.text: I used these to tie down my recovery tracks on my roof rack. As soon as I got on the highway going around 60mph I heard the pop and both boards went flying. All 4 tie downs that I had securing the boards had snapped and luckily there was no one behind us.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these are good bungees in a nice kit The variety is helpful for securing many different things
customer_reviews.author: Holy Cow

customer_reviews.title: Love the carrying case that they come in, great to keep them neat and in one place
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this purchase is even better than I imagined, I didn’t realize all of the different kinds of bungees available. I’ll be able to meet all of the tie down needs I may have for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Sidney LaRhette

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice assortment of bungee cords, all packed in a handy carry case. I have already used several different sizes. Very happy with the quality, assortment, and packaging. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: These bungees are very good quality and useful sizes. I prefer this hook style rather than the carabiner kind. They arrived promptly and include a carrying case. I expect to get a lot of use out of them, and would order them again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Linny86

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful compete set of all you may need for handling car-top applications as well as on the water or in the campsite. Don't hesitate to purchase these; you can register them and there's a warranty. Go for it! I love the net bungee!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Swift

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bungee cord assortment
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is great. Easy to stow. The product has variable sizes and tensions. The pieces I am using now are perfect in length and strength/tension.
customer_reviews.author: Go Warriors

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be heavy duty and well made. Very satisfied with the 24-piece assortment. Great colors. Good price. Excellent customer ratings. Bonus cargo net a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: R. Read

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good quality product. I haven't used them yet but if there are any issues, but assume all is good if I do not update.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger225

customer_reviews.title: ReallyGreat Bungee Cord Set
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered as a gift for my husband. I am very pleased with the included carry case and cargo net. It will be handy when moving things with his truck. It was a quick ship and arrival. It has a good variety of sizes for all different uses. It's a great assortment with it's own storage case. I would recommend this as a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great assortment for everyone
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The cords arrived on time. in good condition and are as described by the seller. This economical product has a variety of different size bungee and a net type one as well. All in a reusable container. Excellent item
customer_reviews.author: jriorda

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set to have in hand to secure stuff around the house and in my truck. seem to be good quality and sturdy enough
customer_reviews.author: JesMat

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’m very satisfied with the product. Very low price for very good quality and quantity of the bungee cords. Nice variety of sizes and very bright vibrant colors. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: F. Magaña

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of bungee cords. I use them to keep things in place on my boat. The plastic covered hooks prevent damage. They have a good amount of tension to hold large or heavier items in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these all over the house for all kinds of projects and they work really well. If I need more, I would most definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J.

product_meta.title: FORTEM Bungee Cords with Hooks, 30pc Set, Canopy Ties, Tarp Clips & Ball Bungees, Plastic Coated Metal Hooks, Cargo Net, Heavy Duty
feature_bullets: MULTIPLE SIZES – Color coded sizes ranging from 18 to 40 inches to use the right cord for the job.
BANG FOR YOUR BUCK – Bonus cargo net is included with each set along with canopy ties, smaller 10 inch bungees and a convenient carrying case.
WIDE RANGE OF USES – The bungee cord set will meet all your travel, yardwork, cargo, camping, and home storage needs.

HEAVY DUTY DESIGN – Made with cross-woven rubber and latex, making them twice as strong and elastic. The hooks are covered with UV-resistant plastic to increase the life of the product and protect your personal belongings from unwanted scratches and harsh weather conditions.
ONE YEAR WARRANTY - Have peace of mind knowing all Fortem products are covered for a full year!

specifications.Special Features: Bonus Cargo Net and Zippered Carrying Case
